text: Itâ€™s all beginning with an unknown mystery to be discovered. I am glad that I have found the doctor through specialist referral. Dr Yong reviewed my history and provided me very comprehensive understanding of the situation, leading me to a stage to know more about my medical condition, provided me in depth understanding of my medical condition with his knowledge. It is a very thorough consultation. Well done to the front desk nurses who serves the best hospitality and arrangement for consultation, medical imaging and also follow up. Thank you.

Dr. Yong Ren is a calm, patient, empathetic doctor with sound clinical judgement. He listened to my mother's concerns and anxieties, and was able to address them and deliver patient-centered care tailored to her needs. Am grateful as well to his excellent clinic staff for their kindness and professionalism. 10/10 would recommend this clinic!

I fractured my foot and was first treated by Dr Yong Ren at emergency - he so kindly returned to the hospital although he had left for the night to go home. I subsequently continued with his expert treatment and am recovering well. The staff are also very  friendly and super helpful! Overall a very positive experience. Thank you all!

I am so thankful for Dr Yong Ren who did the spinal surgery for me. I could stand and walk immediately after the surgery without pain!!! I am also very grateful for the friendly and helpful staffs, Sharon, Jane and Flora.
The clinic nurses are tremendously helpful. Dr Yong is caring & patient. The surgery went very well in good hands.
